title: riot having a meeting regarding nurf?

replies.body:
NURF is the new gamemode :D - this is coming from the pbe http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/03/326-pbe-update.html

Files for what appears to be a mysterious new "NURF" mode have popped up in today's patch...

Here's the tool tip for NURF's "Strategic Buff of Strategistic Strategery":
"+100% Mana and Energy consumption
+200% Cooldown Inflation on Abilities, Activated Items, and Summoner Spells
+50% Anti-Tenacity
+225 Movement Speed Reduction
+200% Delay between basic attacks
Critical strikes deal 50% of total attack damage
This unit deals critical strikes on 150% of its attacks
Protection against superfluous decisiveness
This unit is vulnerable to consequences
Source: Look Before You Leap"
yes i have read the info regarding nurf but i sence riot trolling us for april fools

Riot can't afford to troll with URF. If it is an "April Fools" joke then they'll receive lots and lots (and lots) of hate and probably have significantly less people buying RP as a result, and we all know Riot doesn't want that.
And look how it turned out, most popular game mode Riot has released that a lot of people spam about wanting back.
